review: bought this as a Valentine's gift for my boyfriend, he absolutely loves it. he's been wanting something like this since he played around with his friend's apple t.v  around thanksgiving time. he did a bunch of research and settled on fire t.v because the better performance and the additional content we get for having prime. we're very happy with it thus far. loads of content for us both and a ton of stuff for our 4 years old boy
author: tatiana

review: I love it! Amazon Fire TV is smoother and runs better than Apple TV. And I can do more things with it! Love the quality of the TV shows and movies when being played And the friendliness of it in the family setting. The remote is easy to use and has voice control!!! Amazing! The tutorial as soon as you set up your Amazon Fire TV is super helpful, and quick and painless. My partner had no problems picking up the remote, watching the tutorial and starting using the remote like he had been doing it for years!
author: Brett Richardson

review: It's easy to use and install. All the apps work great. My only gripe is that the voice search only works for Amazon apps, movies, shows, etc.
